ModMetaData.name: Vox's RimCoffee
ModMetaData.author: V0x1m1r
ModMetaData.description: Step right up, folks, and give your colonists the perk they need with Vox’s RimCoffee! Tired miners? Sleepy researchers? Sluggish builders? Not anymore! With our specially crafted coffee blends, your hard-working pawns will dig faster, build stronger, think sharper, and fight harder! Made with only the finest RimWorld-grown beans and a dash of science, this isn’t just coffee— it’s progress in a cup! Grab a can today, and keep your colony running like a well-oiled machine!
